attributes.comment:
My family is in the process of adopting a daughter from China. We have been
informed that this process will take longer than the 18 months allowed for our
USCIS forms and fingerprints. Which means we will have to be refingerprinted and
complete the forms again. This will be a very costly expense for our family and I
am asking that the fees not be increased for the adoption portions of
USCIS.Families already face significant expenses when adopting and this would
be a hardship they should not have to incur! Our government needs to consider
adoptive families and not raise the fees!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Amy
